summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Second Avenue Northeast, in the City of Seattle, from East Fiftieth Street to a connection six (6) feet south of East Forty-fifth Street, by constructing a sewer therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all manholes, flush tanks, catch basins and other appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, in accordance with Resolution No. 2037 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
